text: The United States Virgin Islands competed in the Summer Olympic Games for the first time at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City, Mexico. ==Athletics== ;Men ;Track & road events {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Quarterfinal !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Result !Rank !Result !Rank !Result !Rank !Result !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Franklin Blyden |align=left|110 m hurdles |14.7 |5 |colspan=6|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left|Carl Plaskett |align=left|200 m |21:29 |6 |colspan=6|Did not advance |} ==Sailing== ;Open {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan=7|Race !rowspan=2|Net points !rowspan=2|Final rank |-style="font-size:95%" !1 !2 !3 !4 !5 !6 !7 |-align=center |align=left|Per Dohm |align=left|Finn |28 |22 |27 | ~~32~~ |31 |28 |25 |197 |32 |-align=center |align=left|Rudolph Thompson John Werge Hamber |align=left|Flying Dutchman |17 |23 |22 | ~~27~~ |26 |24 |24 |172 |25 |} ==Weightlifting== ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Military Press !colspan="2"|Snatch !colspan="2"|Clean & Jerk !rowspan="2"|Total !rowspan="2"|Rank |-style="font-size:95%" !Result !Rank !Result !Rank !Result !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Leston Sprauve |align=left |+90 kg |150.0 |13 |140.0 |12 |177.5 |11 |467.5 |12 |} ==References== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1968 Summer Olympics 1968 Summer Olympics Category:1968 in the United States Virgin Islands
title: Virgin Islands at the 1968 Summer Olympics
